title.narrative: Promoting Transparency and Accountability through Advanced Civil Society

description.narrative: (Armenia): This activity reduces the space for corruption by mobilizing citizens in public oversight at national and local levels, providing policy input for improved transparency and accountability, ensuring citizens' access to reliable information on the status of reforms to address corruption, and improving the ability of local CSOs to monitor and assess the impact of reforms in an evidenced-based manner. This is achieved through technical assistance and training. The intended result is to strengthen CSO capacity to hold the government accountable and for citizens to be less tolerant of corrupt practices. It is envisioned that findings of watchdog CSOs and investigative reporters put corrupt practices and systemic issues under the spotlight, thus necessitating government action. This contributes to a more level field for investment, which in turn can foster opportunities for U.S. economic interests and potential investment in the country.
